articles.description: While jamuns are a nutritious fruit, it is important to consume them in moderation, especially if you have diabetes or are trying to manage your weight.
articles.content: Jamun, also known as Malabar plum or Java plum, is a small fruit that is dark purple in colour and has a tangy-sweet taste. Rich in nutrients and numerous health benefits, this fruit also boasts a lo… [+4441 chars]
